name: Matsutake Game
description:
Stick the same mushrooms together to evolve!

Aim for a high score by changing mushrooms to prevent them from overflowing the basket!
If the basket overflows, the game is over.
Aim for a high score by creating large matsutake mushrooms!

Mode

There are two modes: "Normal Mode" and "Shiitake Mode" with only Shiitake mushrooms!

Ranking

Aim for the top ranking and make matsutake mushrooms!

What is the function for streamers?

A function to play in portrait mode for streamers is included.

Streamer Guidelines

・It can be distributed without permission, regardless of whether it is an individual or a corporation.
・We are not responsible for any damage caused by distributing videos of this game.
-The contents of these guidelines may change without notice.
